    • Hi there!

    Sakshi Udeshi went to BITS, Pilani for his undergraduate studies. These days he spends his time @WalmartLabs, tinkering around with new technologies to solve problems of scale. He likes Abstruse Goose and Every Frame a Painting. He thinks writing about himself in third person is kinda funny.
